ovdesc.p: This Live table stores the details of each transaction to be recycled.

desc.p: Holds the status of the recycled transaction.
A cycler transaction can have various statuses:
NEWa new transaction is captured for recycling and recycler is yet to be processed
CURRENTcycler is retrying to settle the dues of the transaction.
COMPLETEDcycler crossed the final retry date or settled fully.
REJECTEDtransaction is rejected for reasons like AA bill is not valid, AA bill has already been settled outside recycler, and so on.
Holds the transaction id raised during settlement.
REPLACE WITH THE BUSINESS USE OF THE FIELD
Enter the validation rules for the field here
This field is populated with the underlying arrangement id, if it is an AA contract.
This field will be updated with the total amount of combined transactions
This field is used to indicate that this transaction is to be processed with another. For example when AA has combined bills and they need to be process together.
This field holds the product category of the underlying contract if there is one.

This field holds the original contract id, for accounts this will be the account number for multi-currency accounts the main account number; for AA this will be the key to AA.BILL.DETAILS, for contract based applications the transaction reference from the entry.
This field will be updated with the interface and local routine data name
This field will be updated with the interface and local routine data value.
This field holds any override or exception message generated if the last retry was unsuccessful.
This field holds the date and time of the last retry
This field will be updated with the original STMT.ENTRY or STMT.ENTRY.DETAIL key for IC related transactions
This field will be updated with the original AC.LOCKED.EVENTS key for blocked funds
This field will be updated with the underlying table that the data is being taken from
For non AA this will be either STMT.ENTRY or STMT.ENTRY.DETAIL.
This field stores the exchange rate used for cross currency transaction during the capture
This field will be updated with the original amount of the transaction.
For AA this will be for information purposes only.
System generated field which holds the link to the RC.TYPE record.
This field will be updated with amount recovered from the last attempt. This field may be multi valued for partial recoveries.
This is the amount that will be processed by the cycler.
System generate field which holds the number of retry attempts for this transaction.
This field holds the end date of the re try period.
This system generated fields holds the retry frequency for the transaction being recycled.
This field holds the date the entry was loaded into the cycler.
This field contains the suspense category used for suspensing this entry.
This field stores the transaction currency.
By default, settlement account is debited.
Number of retry attempts for that transaction based on RC.CONDITION attached for this type of transaction.
This field is to indicate when RETRY.END.DATE falls on holiday, whether it needs to cycle to next or previous working day
This field is used to log the manual changes happened to RC.DETAIL record using RC.CHANGE application or AC.LOCKED.EVENTS application
Holds Terminal number and T24 userid
Stores system date and time of amendment
This field indicates the stage in which the last retry has happened
This field either holds "EOD" or "SOD" for cob retries
For online retries this should be updated as "ONLINE"
This field specifies the trigger for the last retry attempt on a RC.DETAIL record
For COB retry (EOD or SOD) this field is updated as 'RC.SCHEDULED'
For online retries this should be updated as the valid trigger which causes this retry to be scheduled
The next date on which retry service would pick this transaction for processing
FThis will be updated based on the frequency.
This field indicates whether next retry to be done during SOD/EOD/online
This field specifies the settlement conditions given in RC.CONDITION
Defaulted from RC.TYPE during capture of that transaction
This field links a RC.CONDITION reference to a transaction
This field is updated during the capture of the transaction.
when transaction currency is foreign currency
when transaction currency is foreign currency
This status indicates the current settlement status of the transaction
PENDING no settlement has happened . Would updated during capture
SETTLED Fully settled .once cycler settles the transaction fully
PARTIAL Partially settled.During retry if transaction is settled partially
REJECTED Transaction is settled outside of rc framework
Reference to FUNDS.TRANSFER which settles the transaction either partialy or fully
Company code of the company in which the RC.DETAIL is captured
RC.DETAIL.ID which is dependent on this RC.DETAIL.ID
